_getLatestAnswer(address).details: - Can be used onchain for less gas than `getLatestAnswer` (no event emission).

params.token: - ERC20 token to get USD price for

returns._0: price    - the latest price in USD to 8 decimals

getLatestAnswer(address).details: - Native ETH is not supported, but there is no WETH oracle. Use ETH price for WETH token.

params.token_: - ERC20 token to get USD price for

returns._0: price - the latest price in USD to 8 decimals

MAX_PRICE_LATENCY().notice: MAX_PRICE_LATENCY - amount of time between oracle responses until an asset is determined toxiz Assumes Chainlink updates price minimum of once every 24hrs and 1 hour buffer for network issues

NULL_PRICE().notice: NULL_PRICE - null price when asset price feed is deemed invalid

PRICE_DECIMALS().notice: PRICE_DECIMALS - the normalized amount of decimals for returned prices in USD

_getLatestAnswer(address).notice: - View function for oracle pricing that can be used off-chain.

priceFeed(address).notice: Price Feeds - Chainlink Feed Registry with aggregated prices across

documentation.text: @notice Price Feeds - Chainlink Feed Registry with aggregated prices across
@notice NULL_PRICE - null price when asset price feed is deemed invalid
@notice PRICE_DECIMALS - the normalized amount of decimals for returned prices in USD

@notice MAX_PRICE_LATENCY - amount of time between oracle responses until an asset is determined toxiz
 Assumes Chainlink updates price minimum of once every 24hrs and 1 hour buffer for network issues
